content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees should be aware of the fact that disasters can occur and the management's guidelines on what to do in case of a disaster. Employees awareness training assigned to employees based on project needs by account manager request. For audit purposes, employees must sign the training acknowledgement form.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training references to EPAM Business Continuity Program.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e73801b0-4287-4e89-b3b5-cf87ead74550/EPAM%20BCP%20Awareness.pdf?preview=true\",\"style\":{\"height\":\"800px\"}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
